tasks.label: Build
args: mkdir -p "${workspaceFolder}/build/test" && g++ -std=c++17 -O2 "${file}" $(find "${workspaceFolder}/Jiggly_Jam/Libraries" -name '*.cpp' -type f 2>/dev/null) $(find "${workspaceFolder}/Jiggly_Jam/Libraries" -type d 2>/dev/null | while read dir; do echo "-I$dir"; done) -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -o "${workspaceFolder}/build/test/${fileBasenameNoExtension}"
